attributes.action: ban any racist and/or discriminatory media being published and/or distributed by political parties or any person affiliated with a party.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Racist parties such as the BNP have been allowed to publish racist, offensive media. I call on every person who believes in equality and justice to sign this petition and prevent any such media from being circulated by a political party. Racist parties must be stopped.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot publish party political material. Please refer to our terms and conditions for more information: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
